alert.note: Alert for Searcy; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:27AM CDT until August 07 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN SEARCY AND NORTH CENTRAL VAN BUREN COUNTIES... At 626 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Imo, or 10 miles southwest of Marshall, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marsena... Kay... Bohannon... Elba... Imo... Witts Spring... Rocky Hill... Elberta... Watts... Leslie... Canaan... Oxley... Dennard... Botkinburg... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
